title: How to Get Interactive With Take-Two
text:
Take-Two Interactive Software (TTWO) has a really pretty chartThe stock has been off to the races and seems to be pushing for new highsI think it absolutely could get thereTTWO's high could absolutely be breached, which is above $140. If that happens, who knows where it goes next? The implied volatility (IV) is pretty darn cheap at this point, whi...
